articles.content:

articles.title: Anthony Martial's wife reveals death threat messages after Man Utd's midweek defeat - Mirror Online
articles.description: The French forward was heavily criticised for his performance during his side's 2-1 defeat to Sheffield United
articles.content:
Anthony Martial's wife Melanie has shared a series of vile messages she received in the wake of Manchester United's 2-1 defeat to Sheffield United on Wednesday.

articles.author: Theo Squires
articles.title: Jurgen Klopp should break his own transfer rule to solve Liverpool defensive crisis - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: One of Jurgen Klopp's former Dortmund stars is a free agent right now and could be exactly what the manager needs in the short term at Liverpool
articles.content:
Liverpool need a centre-back.
Jurgen Klopp knows it, the fans know it and the media know it. FSG surely know it too.
